# <a name="sharing-with-outlook-on-the-web"></a><span data-ttu-id="9c837-102">使用 Outlook 網頁版共用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9c837-102">Sharing with Outlook on the web</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9c837-103">從您的行事曆，於頁面頂端的工具列上選取 [共用] \*\*\*\*，然後選擇您要共用的行事曆。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9c837-103">From your Calendar, on the toolbar at the top of the page, select **Share**, and choose the calendar you want to share.</span></span>

<img src='data:image/png;base64,' />

<span data-ttu-id="9c837-104">**注意**：您無法共用其他人所擁有的行事曆。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9c837-104">**Note**: You can't share calendars owned by other people.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="9c837-105">輸入您要共用行事曆的人員名稱或其電子郵件地址。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9c837-105">Enter the name or email address of the person you want to share your calendar with.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9c837-106">選擇共用對象可如何使用您的行事曆：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9c837-106">Choose how you want the person to use your calendar:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="9c837-107">**可以檢視我忙碌的時間** 允許共用對象檢視我的忙碌時間，但不包括活動位置等詳細資料。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9c837-107">**Can view when I'm busy** lets them see when you're busy but doesn't include details like the event location.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="9c837-108">**可以檢視標題和位置** 允許共用對象檢視您的忙碌時間，以及活動的標題和位置。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9c837-108">**Can view titles and locations** lets them see when you're busy, as well as the title and location of events.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="9c837-109">**可以檢視所有詳細資料** 允許共用對象檢視活動的所有詳細資料。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9c837-109">**Can view all details** lets them see all the details of your events.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="9c837-110">**可以編輯** 允許共用對象編輯您的行事曆。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9c837-110">**Can edit** lets them edit your calendar.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="9c837-111">**代理人** 允許共用對象編輯您的行事曆並與他人共用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9c837-111">**Delegate** lets them edit your calendar and share it with others.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9c837-112">選取 [共用] \*\*\*\*。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9c837-112">Select **Share**.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9c837-113">如需詳細資訊，請參閱[在 Outlook 網頁版中共用行事曆](https://support.microsoft.com/office/7ecef8ae-139c-40d9-bae2-a23977ee58d5)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9c837-113">Please see [Share your calendar in Outlook on the web](https://support.microsoft.com/office/7ecef8ae-139c-40d9-bae2-a23977ee58d5) for more information.</span></span>
